title: I want to know if they are making the new Nesbit Court a project. I\'am hoping for a nice middle class neighborhood. We have enough low income places in that area and it sure would be nice to see working class people living there. I\'am sure it would help with the crime in that area also.
text:
Here's a link to our latest story about Nesbitt Courts:
